    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_113721</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_113721</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Pulling a conducting wire upward in a magnetic field</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Leitleitung aufwärts in einem magnetischem 
ziehend, fangen Sie auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tirant un fil de conduite vers le haut dans un 
champ magnétique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Puxando um fio conduzindo para cima em um campo 
magnético</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tirando un legare di condotta verso l'alto in un 
campo magnetico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τραβώντας ένα καλώδιο διεύθυνσης πρός τα πάνω σε 
ένα μαγνητικό πεδίο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tirando de un alambre que conduce hacia arriba en 
un campo magnético</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration demonstrates that when a conducting wire is pulled upwards in a uniform magnetic field, induced currents flow through the wire producing a motor effect force that pulls it downward.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conducting wire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electromagnetic induction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">induced current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lenz's Law</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">motor effect force</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt daß, wird gezogen wenn 
eine Leitleitung aufwärts in ein konstantes magnetisches, 
fangen Sie auf, geverursachte Ströme durchfließen die 
Leitung, eine Bewegungseffektkraft produzierend, die Züge es 
abwärts.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration démontre que quand un fil de 
conduite est tiré vers le haut dans un champ magnétique uniforme, 
les courants induits traversent le fil produisant une force d'effet de
moteur qui des tractions il en bas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração demonstra que quando um fio 
conduzindo é puxado para cima em um campo magnético uniforme, as 
correntes induzidas correm através do fio produzindo uma força do 
efeito do motor que trações ele para baixo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione dimostra che quando un 
legare di condotta è tirato verso l'alto in un campo magnetico 
dell'uniforme, le correnti indotte attraversano il legare 
producendo una forza di effetto del motore che tiri esso verso il 
basso.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση καταδεικνύει ότι όταν τραβιέται 
προς τα πάνω ένα καλώδιο διεύθυνσης σε ένα ομοιόμορφο μαγνητικό
πεδίο, τα προκληθέντα ρεύματα διατρέχουν του καλωδίου παράγοντας
μια δύναμη επίδρασης μηχανών που το τραβά προς τα κάτω.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración demuestra que cuando un alambre 
que conduce se tira hacia arriba en un campo magnético uniforme, 
las corrientes inducidas atraviesan el alambre produciendo una fuerza 
del efecto del motor que los tirones él hacia abajo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Leitleitung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">elektromagnetische Induktion</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">geverursachter Strom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gesetz Lenzs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie auf</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
